verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>, when he changed <WH8138> <WH8763> his behaviour <WH2940> before <WH6440> Abimelech <WH40>; who drove him away <WH1644> <WH8762>, and he departed <WH3212> <WH8799>. I will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> the YY <WH3068> at all times <WH6256>: his praise <WH8416> shall continually <WH8548> be in my mouth <WH6310>.
My soul <WH5315> shall make her boast <WH1984> <WH8691> in the YY <WH3068>: the humble <WH6035> shall hear <WH8085> <WH8799> thereof, and be glad <WH8055> <WH8799>.
O magnify <WH1431> <WH8761> the YY <WH3068> with me, and let us exalt <WH7311> <WH8787> his name <WH8034> together <WH3162>.
I sought <WH1875> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, and he heard <WH6030> <WH8804> me, and delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> me from all my fears <WH4035>.
They looked <WH5027> <WH8689> unto him, and were lightened <WH5102> <WH8804>: and their faces <WH6440> were not ashamed <WH2659> <WH8799>.
This poor man <WH6041> cried <WH7121> <WH8804>, and the YY <WH3068> heard <WH8085> <WH8804> him, and saved <WH3467> <WH8689> him out of all his troubles <WH6869>.
The angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> encampeth <WH2583> <WH8802> round about <WH5439> them that fear <WH3373> him, and delivereth <WH2502> <WH8762> them.
O taste <WH2938> <WH8798> and see <WH7200> <WH8798> that the YY <WH3068> is good <WH2896>: blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that trusteth <WH2620> <WH8799> in him.
O fear <WH3372> <WH8798> the YY <WH3068>, ye his saints <WH6918>: for there is no want <WH4270> to them that fear <WH3373> him.
The young lions <WH3715> do lack <WH7326> <WH8804>, and suffer hunger <WH7456> <WH8804>: but they that seek <WH1875> <WH8802> the YY <WH3068> shall not want <WH2637> <WH8799> any good <WH2896> thing.
Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, ye children <WH1121>, hearken <WH8085> <WH8798> unto me: I will teach <WH3925> <WH8762> you the fear <WH3374> of the YY <WH3068>.
What man <WH376> is he that desireth <WH2655> life <WH2416>, and loveth <WH157> <WH8802> many days <WH3117>, that he may see <WH7200> <WH8800> good <WH2896> ?
Keep <WH5341> <WH8798> thy tongue <WH3956> from evil <WH7451>, and thy lips <WH8193> from speaking <WH1696> <WH8763> guile <WH4820>.
Depart <WH5493> <WH8798> from evil <WH7451>, and do <WH6213> <WH8798> good <WH2896>; seek <WH1245> <WH8761> peace <WH7965>, and pursue <WH7291> <WH8798> it.
The eyes <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068> are upon the righteous <WH6662>, and his ears <WH241> are open unto their cry <WH7775>.
The face <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068> is against them that do <WH6213> <WH8802> evil <WH7451>, to cut off <WH3772> <WH8687> the remembrance <WH2143> of them from the earth <WH776>.
The righteous cry <WH6817> <WH8804>, and the YY <WH3068> heareth <WH8085> <WH8804>, and delivereth <WH5337> <WH8689> them out of all their troubles <WH6869>.
The YY <WH3068> is nigh <WH7138> unto them that are of a broken <WH7665> <WH8737> heart <WH3820>; and saveth <WH3467> <WH8686> such as be of a contrite <WH1793> spirit <WH7307>.
Many <WH7227> are the afflictions <WH7451> of the righteous <WH6662>: but the YY <WH3068> delivereth <WH5337> <WH8686> him out of them all.
He keepeth <WH8104> <WH8802> all his bones <WH6106>: not one <WH259> of them <WH2007> is broken <WH7665> <WH8738>.
Evil <WH7451> shall slay <WH4191> <WH8787> the wicked <WH7563>: and they that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> the righteous <WH6662> shall be desolate <WH816> <WH8799>.
The YY <WH3068> redeemeth <WH6299> <WH8802> the soul <WH5315> of his servants <WH5650>: and none of them that trust <WH2620> <WH8802> in him shall be desolate <WH816> <WH8799>.
